title: Easy Shepherd's Pie Recipe
description: This shepherd's pie has a layer of ground beef in savory gravy with vegetables and a rich and cheesy potato topping for classic comfort food.
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Main Dishes Savory Pie Recipes Shepherd's Pie Recipes Easy Shepherd's Pie 4.7 (180) 143 Reviews 95 Photos Easy shepherd's pie — the name says it all with this recipe. This meaty dish is comforting and hearty with cream cheese added to the mashed potato topping for irresistible flavor, all in just a few simple steps. Submitted by Philadelphia Updated on February 24, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 95 95 95 95 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Total Time: 40 mins Servings: 6 Yield: 1 (9-inch square) casserole Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 1 pound ground beef 2 cups hot mashed potatoes 4 ounces Philadelphia Cream Cheese, cubed 1 cup Kraft Shredded Cheddar Cheese, divided 2 cloves garlic, minced 4 cups frozen mixed vegetables, thawed 1 cup beef gravy Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Brown meat in a large skillet. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco While the meat is browning, mix potatoes, cream cheese, 1/2 cup shredded cheese, and garlic until well blended. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Drain meat. Return to skillet; stir in vegetables and gravy. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Spoon into a 9-inch square baking dish. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Cover with potato mixture and remaining 1/2 cup shredded cheese. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Bake in the preheated oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco Variations For BBQ shepherd's pie: Prepare as directed, omitting the garlic and substituting 3/4 cup Kraft Original Barbecue Sauce mixed with 1/2 teaspoon onion powder for the gravy.For a healthier version: Prepare with extra lean ground beef, Philadelphia Neufchatel Cream Cheese, 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese, and Kraft 2% Milk Shredded Reduced Fat Cheddar Cheese.For a quicker version: Use instant mashed potatoes. Prepare potatoes as directed on the package, omitting the milk. This way when you add the cream cheese the potatoes stay fluffy. I Made It Print 556 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 435 Calories 25g Fat 32g Carbs 24g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 435 % Daily Value * Total Fat 25g 32% Saturated Fat 12g 60% Cholesterol 89mg 30% Sodium 772mg 34% Total Carbohydrate 32g 11% Dietary Fiber 6g 20% Total Sugars 1g Protein 24g 48% Vitamin C 16mg 18% Calcium 60mg 5% Iron 3mg 15% Potassium 645mg 14% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Easy Shepherd's Pie 01 of 95 Photo by  Brie Goldman / Food Stylist: Addelyn Evans / Prop Stylist: Gabriel Greco 02 of 95 Photo by  Adela Lynn Reinke 09/19/2024 A keeper! Easy to follow Worth the effort Crowd-pleaser Great flavors This recipe was easy peezy for me (someone who doesn't like to cook lol) and delicious. I doubled the recipe and fed 6 people and some had seconds. 03 of 95 Photo by  Lela 02/28/2024 An easy recipe to make that the entire family loved. No changes necessary! 04 of 95 Photo by  Paula 02/28/2024 OK with tweaks I used instant potatoes as the recipe tip suggested. I also added salt and pepper to the beef/vegetable mixture. It definitely needed it. 05 of 95 Photo by  1010lisalynn 02/10/2024 Great casserole for beginner cooks and experienced cooks alike!Affordable ingredients with good flavor mixed all together. The cream cheese creates a creamy dish that sticks together for easy cutting into four to six servings. Ideal for microwaved leftovers.Changes I made were:• Prepared an 8x8 glass Pyrex baking dish with a light brushing of garlic oil olive• Used ground turkey instead of ground beef• Used frozen peas instead of frozen mixed vegetables• Made my own beef gravy with beef stock, onion salt and a corn starch slurry• After cooking, broiled the dish for 4 minutes at about 8” below the broiler• Added sprinkles of parsley after plate up 06 of 95 Photo by  PuffyPea2423 09/22/2023 use whatever veggies I have around. yesterday it was peppers from the garden, corn and carrots. so yummy 07 of 95 Photo by  PeppyKelp9477 08/02/2023 Very good! Made it exactly to the recipe except added a small onion. Everything I make with hamburger gets an onion! 08 of 95 Photo by  TimmyD 06/05/2023 I used lamb and added some sautéed scallions with a bit of fresh thyme and rosemary. I also used a truffle butter in the mashed potatoes. So good! 09 of 95 Photo by  Sonia Escobar 01/05/2022 Loved it! It's a great recipe and easy to make! After I drained the meat, I made the gravy with the drippings. I also added salt and pepper. Definitely a repeat! 10 of 95 Photo by  Lourdes Copitas 11/12/2021 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Shepherd's Pie 3,281 Ratings Vegan Shepherd's Pie 266 Ratings Easy English Cottage Pie 477 Ratings Traditional Shepherd's Pie 18 Ratings Sophie's Shepherd's Pie 17 Ratings Simple Shepherd's Pie 575 Ratings A Scotsman's Shepherd Pie 397 Ratings Kraft's Shepherd's Pie 132 Ratings Simply Potatoes® Easy Shepherd's Pie 43 Ratings Slow Cooker Shepherd’s Pie Saucy Shepherd's Pie 7 Ratings Steff's Shepherd Pie 581 Ratings Mom's Shepherd's Pie 154 Ratings Shortcut Shepherd's Pie 584 Ratings Mexican Shepherd's Pie 443 Ratings Philly-Cheesesteak Shepherd's Pie with Spaghetti Squash Topping 3 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
